level_1.name: Analyze Shadow
level_1.description: Target a Shadow to get details of its Principles, hit dice, and abilities

level_1.name: Call Lesser Servitor
level_1.description: Summon a Lesser Servitor Shadow to perform mindless tasks

level_1.name: Call Manipulatory Manifestation
level_1.description: Summon a Manipulatory Manifestation Shadow to remotely move objects

level_1.name: Conjured Implement
level_1.description: Summon a Shadow-object of no more than TL3 mechanical complexity

level_1.name: Put Down
level_1.description: Banish a Shadow you have summoned before its natural dissolution

level_1.name: Shadow Nourishment
level_1.description: Sustain yourself on metadimensional energies, like a Shadow might

level_1.name: Shadow Reinforcement
level_1.description: Heal 1d6+2 HP of damage per caster level on a visible allied Shadow

level_1.name: Shadow Ward, Lesser
level_1.description: Weak Shadows cannot cross a warding line you indicate without damage

level_2.name: Afflictive Focus Pact
level_2.description: Pact with a Shadow to exchange the damage suffered by each to the other

level_2.name: Call Drudge
level_2.description: Summon a Drudge Shadow to provide intelligent if obsequious labor

level_2.name: Call Myrmidon
level_2.description: Summon a Myrmidon Shadow to fight for you or guard you

level_2.name: Call Odalisque
level_2.description: Summon an Odalisque Shadow to blandish or distract another

level_2.name: Shadow Cyst
level_2.description: Fold a summoned Shadow into a hidden cyst to carry it around discreetly

level_2.name: Shadow Displacement
level_2.description: Exchange locations with a summoned Shadow within 10 meters per caster level

level_2.name: Shadow Impulse
level_2.description: Compel a Shadow to obey a sentence of command for a few rounds

level_2.name: Telepathic Shadow Link
level_2.description: Forge a telepathic communications link with a visible Shadow

level_3.name: Call Minion
level_3.description: Summon a Minion Shadow to provide a wide variety of competent services

level_3.name: Call Shadow Chariot
level_3.description: Summon a Shadow Chariot to serve as a flying vehicle

level_3.name: Call Vigilant
level_3.description: Summon a Vigilant Shadow to act as a guardian and observer

level_3.name: Prolong Pact
level_3.description: As an Instant, triple the duration of a summons after you withdraw Focus

level_3.name: Shadow Compulsion
level_3.description: Compel a Shadow to obey a simple command for the rest of the scene

level_3.name: Shadow Puppetry
level_3.description: Take remote control of a summoned Shadow's body, at some risk if destroyed

level_3.name: Shadow Ward, Greater
level_3.description: Shadows cannot cross the ward-line you draw without risk of damage

level_3.name: Substitutionary Focus Pact
level_3.description: Accept a persistent point of System Strain to maintain a Shadow without Focus

level_4.name: Call Deceiver
level_4.description: Summon a clever, shapeshifting Deceiver Shadow

level_4.name: Call Render
level_4.description: Summon a sluggish, stupid, but immensely strong Render Shadow

level_4.name: Directive Focus Pact
level_4.description: Grant a Shadow continued existence by giving it a specific task to achieve

level_4.name: Shadow Domination
level_4.description: Implant a Shadow with an overriding compulsion to carry out a particular task

level_4.name: Summon Forth the Servant
level_4.description: Teleport a summoned Shadow into your presence if they're in the same system

level_4.name: Sustaining Focus Pact
level_4.description: Expend costly ingredients to permanently fix a Shadow in this world

level_5.name: Blood Sacrifice
level_5.description: Feed sentient lives to a Shadow to fix it permanently in this world

level_5.name: Call Devourer
level_5.description: Summon a blindly murderous Devourer Shadow to kill everything around you

level_5.name: Call Stellar Phoenix
level_5.description: Summon a Stellar Phoenix to carry you to any in-system destination

level_5.name: Shadow Enslavement
level_5.description: Utterly enslave a visible Shadow at a cost of a persistent System Strain point

level_5.name: Shadow Ward, Perfected
level_5.description: Shadows cannot cross your ward line safely, and weak Shadows can't at all

level_5.name: Summoner's Font
level_5.description: Consecrate an area to fuel friendly Shadows without need for Focus
